Group_Name.description: Grouping name for the pneumonia cohort classification

Term.description: Disease Ontology term name for the pneumonia type

DOID.description: Disease Ontology ID - standardized identifier for diseases

ICD10Code.description: International Classification of Diseases, 10th Revision code for diagnosis

subject_id.description: Unique identifier for each patient. Any rows associated with a single subject_id pertain to the same individual.

hadm_id.description: Unique identifier for a single patient's admission to the hospital. Represents a single hospitalization encounter.

stay_id.description: Unique identifier for an ICU stay. Generated identifier derived from transfers table, not based on raw data identifier.

gender.description: Genotypical sex of the patient (M = Male, F = Female)

dod.description: De-identified date of death. Extracted from hospital records and Massachusetts State Registry of Vital Records. Censored at one year after last hospital discharge.

admittime.description: Date and time the patient was admitted to the hospital

dischtime.description: Date and time the patient was discharged from the hospital

los_hospital.description: Length of stay in the hospital measured in days

admission_age.description: Age of the patient at the time of hospital admission
admission_age.source: Derived from patients and admissions tables

hospital_expire_flag.description: Binary flag indicating whether patient died during hospitalization (1 = died, 0 = survived to discharge)

hospstay_seq.description: Sequential number of the hospital stay for this patient (chronologically ordered)

first_hosp_stay.description: Boolean indicating if this is the patient's first hospital stay in the database

icu_intime.description: Date and time the patient was transferred into the ICU

icu_outtime.description: Date and time the patient was transferred out of the ICU

los_icu.description: Length of stay in the ICU measured in fractional days

icustay_seq.description: Sequential number of the ICU stay for this patient within a hospitalization

first_icu_stay.description: Boolean indicating if this is the patient's first ICU stay in the hospitalization

admittime_1.description: Duplicate of admittime - hospital admission date and time

dischtime_1.description: Duplicate of dischtime - hospital discharge date and time

deathtime.description: Time of in-hospital death. Only present if patient died in hospital, usually same as dischtime.

admission_type.description: Type of admission classifying urgency. Values include: AMBULATORY OBSERVATION, DIRECT EMER., DIRECT OBSERVATION, ELECTIVE, EU OBSERVATION, EW EMER., OBSERVATION ADMIT, SURGICAL SAME DAY ADMISSION, URGENT

admission_location.description: Location of patient prior to arriving at hospital (e.g., EMERGENCY ROOM, PHYSICIAN REFERRAL, TRANSFER FROM HOSPITAL)

insurance.description: Type of insurance the patient has for this hospitalization

language.description: Primary language spoken by the patient

marital_status.description: Marital status of the patient (e.g., MARRIED, SINGLE, DIVORCED, WIDOWED)

gender_1.description: Duplicate of gender - patient's genotypical sex

anchor_age.description: Patient's age in the anchor_year. If over 89, set to 91 for de-identification.

anchor_year.description: Shifted year for the patient (deidentified, between 2100-2200). Used with anchor_year_group to determine approximate real admission year.

dod_1.description: Duplicate of dod - de-identified date of death

hematocrit_min.description: Minimum hematocrit value during ICU stay. Hematocrit is the percentage of red blood cells in blood.

hematocrit_max.description: Maximum hematocrit value during ICU stay

hemoglobin_min.description: Minimum hemoglobin value during ICU stay. Hemoglobin is the oxygen-carrying protein in red blood cells.

hemoglobin_max.description: Maximum hemoglobin value during ICU stay

platelets_min.description: Minimum platelet count during ICU stay. Platelets are blood cells that help with clotting.

platelets_max.description: Maximum platelet count during ICU stay

wbc_min.description: Minimum white blood cell count during ICU stay. WBCs are immune system cells.

wbc_max.description: Maximum white blood cell count during ICU stay

albumin_min.description: Minimum albumin level during ICU stay. Albumin is a protein made by the liver.

albumin_max.description: Maximum albumin level during ICU stay

globulin_min.description: Minimum globulin level during ICU stay. Globulins are a group of proteins in blood.

globulin_max.description: Maximum globulin level during ICU stay

total_protein_min.description: Minimum total protein level during ICU stay

total_protein_max.description: Maximum total protein level during ICU stay

aniongap_min.description: Minimum anion gap during ICU stay. Anion gap measures metabolic acidosis.

aniongap_max.description: Maximum anion gap during ICU stay

bicarbonate_min.description: Minimum bicarbonate level during ICU stay. Important for acid-base balance.

bicarbonate_max.description: Maximum bicarbonate level during ICU stay

bun_min.description: Minimum blood urea nitrogen during ICU stay. Measures kidney function.

bun_max.description: Maximum blood urea nitrogen during ICU stay

calcium_min.description: Minimum calcium level during ICU stay

calcium_max.description: Maximum calcium level during ICU stay

chloride_min.description: Minimum chloride level during ICU stay

chloride_max.description: Maximum chloride level during ICU stay

creatinine_min.description: Minimum creatinine level during ICU stay. Measures kidney function.

creatinine_max.description: Maximum creatinine level during ICU stay

glucose_min.description: Minimum blood glucose level during ICU stay

glucose_max.description: Maximum blood glucose level during ICU stay

sodium_min.description: Minimum sodium level during ICU stay

sodium_max.description: Maximum sodium level during ICU stay

potassium_min.description: Minimum potassium level during ICU stay

potassium_max.description: Maximum potassium level during ICU stay

abs_basophils_min.description: Minimum absolute basophil count during ICU stay. Basophils are a type of white blood cell.

abs_basophils_max.description: Maximum absolute basophil count during ICU stay

abs_eosinophils_min.description: Minimum absolute eosinophil count during ICU stay. Eosinophils are involved in allergic responses.

abs_eosinophils_max.description: Maximum absolute eosinophil count during ICU stay

abs_lymphocytes_min.description: Minimum absolute lymphocyte count during ICU stay. Lymphocytes are key immune cells.

abs_lymphocytes_max.description: Maximum absolute lymphocyte count during ICU stay

abs_monocytes_min.description: Minimum absolute monocyte count during ICU stay. Monocytes are involved in immune response.

abs_monocytes_max.description: Maximum absolute monocyte count during ICU stay

abs_neutrophils_min.description: Minimum absolute neutrophil count during ICU stay. Neutrophils are primary infection fighters.

abs_neutrophils_max.description: Maximum absolute neutrophil count during ICU stay

atyps_min.description: Minimum atypical lymphocyte count during ICU stay

atyps_max.description: Maximum atypical lymphocyte count during ICU stay

bands_min.description: Minimum band neutrophil count during ICU stay. Bands are immature neutrophils.

bands_max.description: Maximum band neutrophil count during ICU stay

imm_granulocytes_min.description: Minimum immature granulocyte count during ICU stay

imm_granulocytes_max.description: Maximum immature granulocyte count during ICU stay

metas_min.description: Minimum metamyelocyte count during ICU stay. Metamyelocytes are immature granulocytes.

metas_max.description: Maximum metamyelocyte count during ICU stay

nrbc_min.description: Minimum nucleated red blood cell count during ICU stay. Normally only found in bone marrow.

nrbc_max.description: Maximum nucleated red blood cell count during ICU stay

d_dimer_min.description: Minimum D-dimer level during ICU stay. Marker of blood clot breakdown.

d_dimer_max.description: Maximum D-dimer level during ICU stay

fibrinogen_min.description: Minimum fibrinogen level during ICU stay. Protein essential for blood clotting.

fibrinogen_max.description: Maximum fibrinogen level during ICU stay

thrombin_min.description: Minimum thrombin time during ICU stay. Measures final stage of blood clotting.

thrombin_max.description: Maximum thrombin time during ICU stay

inr_min.description: Minimum International Normalized Ratio during ICU stay. Standardized measure of blood clotting.

pt_min.description: Minimum prothrombin time during ICU stay. Measures time for blood to clot.

pt_max.description: Maximum prothrombin time during ICU stay

ptt_min.description: Minimum partial thromboplastin time during ICU stay. Measures intrinsic clotting pathway.

ptt_max.description: Maximum partial thromboplastin time during ICU stay

alt_min.description: Minimum alanine aminotransferase during ICU stay. Liver enzyme.

alp_min.description: Minimum alkaline phosphatase during ICU stay. Enzyme from liver and bone.

alp_max.description: Maximum alkaline phosphatase during ICU stay

ast_min.description: Minimum aspartate aminotransferase during ICU stay. Liver and muscle enzyme.

amylase_min.description: Minimum amylase during ICU stay. Pancreatic enzyme.

bilirubin_total_min.description: Minimum total bilirubin during ICU stay. Breakdown product of red blood cells.

bilirubin_total_max.description: Maximum total bilirubin during ICU stay

bilirubin_direct_min.description: Minimum direct (conjugated) bilirubin during ICU stay

bilirubin_direct_max.description: Maximum direct bilirubin during ICU stay

bilirubin_indirect_min.description: Minimum indirect (unconjugated) bilirubin during ICU stay

bilirubin_indirect_max.description: Maximum indirect bilirubin during ICU stay

ck_cpk_min.description: Minimum creatine kinase during ICU stay. Enzyme from muscle tissue.

ck_cpk_max.description: Maximum creatine kinase during ICU stay

ck_mb_min.description: Minimum CK-MB during ICU stay. Cardiac-specific creatine kinase isoenzyme.

ggt_min.description: Minimum gamma-glutamyl transferase during ICU stay. Liver enzyme.

ld_ldh_min.description: Minimum lactate dehydrogenase during ICU stay. Enzyme present in many tissues.

heart_rate_min.description: Minimum heart rate during ICU stay

heart_rate_max.description: Maximum heart rate during ICU stay

heart_rate_mean.description: Mean heart rate during ICU stay

sbp_min.description: Minimum systolic blood pressure during ICU stay

sbp_max.description: Maximum systolic blood pressure during ICU stay

sbp_mean.description: Mean systolic blood pressure during ICU stay

dbp_min.description: Minimum diastolic blood pressure during ICU stay

dbp_max.description: Maximum diastolic blood pressure during ICU stay

dbp_mean.description: Mean diastolic blood pressure during ICU stay

mbp_min.description: Minimum mean arterial blood pressure during ICU stay

mbp_max.description: Maximum mean arterial blood pressure during ICU stay

mbp_mean.description: Mean of mean arterial blood pressure during ICU stay

resp_rate_min.description: Minimum respiratory rate during ICU stay

resp_rate_max.description: Maximum respiratory rate during ICU stay

resp_rate_mean.description: Mean respiratory rate during ICU stay

temperature_min.description: Minimum body temperature during ICU stay

temperature_max.description: Maximum body temperature during ICU stay

temperature_mean.description: Mean body temperature during ICU stay

spo2_min.description: Minimum peripheral oxygen saturation during ICU stay

spo2_max.description: Maximum peripheral oxygen saturation during ICU stay

spo2_mean.description: Mean peripheral oxygen saturation during ICU stay

glucose_min_1.description: Minimum glucose from vital signs charting during ICU stay

glucose_max_1.description: Maximum glucose from vital signs charting during ICU stay

glucose_mean.description: Mean glucose from vital signs charting during ICU stay

lactate_min.description: Minimum lactate level during ICU stay. Marker of tissue hypoxia.

lactate_max.description: Maximum lactate level during ICU stay

ph_min.description: Minimum blood pH during ICU stay. Measures acid-base status.

ph_max.description: Maximum blood pH during ICU stay

so2_min.description: Minimum oxygen saturation from blood gas during ICU stay

so2_max.description: Maximum oxygen saturation from blood gas during ICU stay

po2_min.description: Minimum partial pressure of oxygen during ICU stay

po2_max.description: Maximum partial pressure of oxygen during ICU stay

pco2_min.description: Minimum partial pressure of carbon dioxide during ICU stay

pco2_max.description: Maximum partial pressure of carbon dioxide during ICU stay

aado2_min.description: Minimum alveolar-arterial oxygen difference during ICU stay. Measures gas exchange efficiency.

aado2_max.description: Maximum A-a oxygen gradient during ICU stay

pao2fio2ratio_min.description: Minimum PaO2/FiO2 ratio during ICU stay. Key measure of oxygenation, used in ARDS criteria.

pao2fio2ratio_max.description: Maximum PaO2/FiO2 ratio during ICU stay

baseexcess_min.description: Minimum base excess during ICU stay. Measures metabolic component of acid-base status.

baseexcess_max.description: Maximum base excess during ICU stay

bicarbonate_min_1.description: Minimum bicarbonate from blood gas during ICU stay

bicarbonate_max_1.description: Maximum bicarbonate from blood gas during ICU stay

totalco2_min.description: Minimum total CO2 content during ICU stay

totalco2_max.description: Maximum total CO2 content during ICU stay

hematocrit_min_1.description: Minimum hematocrit from blood gas during ICU stay

hematocrit_max_1.description: Maximum hematocrit from blood gas during ICU stay

hemoglobin_min_1.description: Minimum hemoglobin from blood gas during ICU stay

hemoglobin_max_1.description: Maximum hemoglobin from blood gas during ICU stay

carboxyhemoglobin_min.description: Minimum carboxyhemoglobin during ICU stay. Measures carbon monoxide binding to hemoglobin.

methemoglobin_min.description: Minimum methemoglobin during ICU stay. Hemoglobin with oxidized iron.

temperature_min_1.description: Minimum temperature from blood gas analyzer during ICU stay

temperature_max_1.description: Maximum temperature from blood gas analyzer during ICU stay

chloride_min_1.description: Minimum chloride from blood gas during ICU stay

chloride_max_1.description: Maximum chloride from blood gas during ICU stay

calcium_min_1.description: Minimum ionized calcium from blood gas during ICU stay

calcium_max_1.description: Maximum ionized calcium from blood gas during ICU stay

glucose_min_2.description: Minimum glucose from blood gas analyzer during ICU stay

glucose_max_2.description: Maximum glucose from blood gas analyzer during ICU stay

potassium_min_1.description: Minimum potassium from blood gas during ICU stay

potassium_max_1.description: Maximum potassium from blood gas during ICU stay

sodium_min_1.description: Minimum sodium from blood gas during ICU stay

sodium_max_1.description: Maximum sodium from blood gas during ICU stay

charttime.description: Time at which the observation or measurement was charted/recorded

specimen_id.description: Unique identifier for a specimen. Multiple measurements from same specimen share specimen_id.

crp.description: C-reactive protein level. Acute phase reactant and marker of inflammation/infection.

urineoutput.description: Total urine output during ICU stay. Key measure of kidney function and fluid balance.

weight_admit.description: Patient's weight at time of admission

weight_min.description: Minimum recorded weight during ICU stay

weight_max.description: Maximum recorded weight during ICU stay
